author: Fraser Campbell
description: Made to appeal to drinkers who actually want a cocktail that tastes like Treacle. And it does.
name: Treacle No.2
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
7.5 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR half the rum with two ice cubes in a chilled glass
Add PX sherry, sugar syrup, bitters, and two more ice cubes
STIR some more and add another two ice cubes and the rest of the rum
STIR some more and add more ice
